meanings.definition: To act on an impulse or sudden urge.
meanings.sent1: She impulsed to buy the colorful dress without thinking.
meanings.sent2: He impulsed to jump into the pool on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The cat impulsed to chase after the moving laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The child impulsed to reach for the tempting cookie jar.
meanings.sent5: The student impulsed to raise their hand to answer the question eagerly.

meanings.definition: A sudden strong and unreflective urge or desire.
meanings.sent1: Her impulsed to travel to new places led her on exciting adventures.
meanings.sent2: The impulsed for chocolate overtook him after dinner.
meanings.sent3: His impulsed for a new toy made him save up his allowance.
meanings.sent4: The impulsed for success burned brightly in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The impulsed for knowledge drove him to read every book in the library.
